alert.note: Alert for Grand Isle; Western Addison; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 15 at 3:26AM EST until November 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 7 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. * WHERE...The Champlain and St Lawrence Valleys. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 7 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop overnight tonight, becoming steadiest through Wednesday morning. Rain will likely mix in at times in the afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Grand Isle; Western Addison; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin
